Detailed Description

Class representing a rigid body.

Member Function Documentation

◆ className()

const char* rev::RigidBody::className ( ) const
inlineoverridevirtual

The name of this class.

Every subclass should redefine/override this property to return its name

Reimplemented from rev::PhysicsActor.

◆ clearShapes()

void rev::RigidBody::clearShapes ( )

Clears shapes from the rigid body.

Does not need to be called on destruction, detachment is automatic

◆ namespaceName()

const char* rev::RigidBody::namespaceName ( ) const
inlineoverridevirtual

The full namespace for this class.

Every subclass should redefine/override this property to return its full namespace. The built in logging methods will use this value for the message category

Reimplemented from rev::PhysicsActor.

◆ rigidType()

RigidType rev::RigidBody::rigidType ( ) const
inline

The type of rigid body.

Setting this requires a call to the reinitialize routine in order to take effect on the underlying PhysX body

Member Data Documentation

◆ m_isKinematic

bool rev::RigidBody::m_isKinematic
protected

Whether or not the object is kinematic.

If the object is kinematic, it may not participate in simulation collision, only for triggers or scene queries of moving objects under animation control

◆ m_shapes

std::vector<PhysicsShape*> rev::RigidBody::m_shapes
protected

Shape instantiations.

Can also be obtained with PxRigidActor::getShapes
